name: Northern Retreat
description:
You completed your mission!

Now you just have to retreat north to escape enemy territory.

Good luck soldier!

How to play:

  • Use Mouse + WASD to move and aim
  • Left mouse button: Fire weapon
  • Right mouse button: Change weapon

Upgrade all your weapon capabilities with the yellow and gray boxes. You can upgrade after each completed level.

Hints:

  • You can control the rocket mid-air by holding the mouse button down and perform trick shots for extra points!

This game was developed back in 2011 after being inspired by a Ludum Dare stream.

Enjoy!
